full_text: >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) OAG)" 08/11/2019 09:29 >>> Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG? Does 12 noon work? If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier. Tim On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote: How do they have this info? Unbelieveable. https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/ Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone Page 2717 DOJ-OGR-00024326
